ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: Hatar does spawn in Oasis.  I ve spent many, many hours in oasis as my monk and as my bard and I have never seen Hatar.  I always look at them to see, and
ygData.messageBody:
Hatar does spawn in Oasis. I've spent many, many hours in oasis as my monk
and as my bard and I have never seen Hatar. I always look at them to see, and
click on the ones too far away to have text over them... Never seen him. I
would imagine that it's considerably easier/cheaper to get/buy an
executioner's hood.

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: <jhenders@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 07, 1999 12:44 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Help I look like a Nazi


> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Tue, Sep 07/99, John.Curry@... wrote:
> > From: John.Curry@...
> >
> > OK, cool.
> >
> > I really appreciate all of your comments about my unfortunate human banded
> > helm situation. I think that I will probably try to obtain a Turban from
> > the Sand Giant. I looked it up and the turban gives +10 to AC with almost
> > no weight. Does anyone know how much they generally sell for, so I can
> > start saving my plats... or gather sympathetic party to hunt with me? :)
> >
>
> Hatar is a spawn so rare, I, and most people I know, have never seen
> him. He spawns in either Oasis or S Ro (so I've heard) and I used to
> check tracking every time I passed through there. I even auctioned that
> I would pay 100 plat for a tell from someone when he was sighted and
> never once got a message. I lucked out and got one from someone who did
> stumble across him, and I traded a serpantine bracer for it. I've only
> run across 3 of them on Tarrew Marr, counting the one I have.
>
> --
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
